main event: A civilian observed a round object in the sky below the moon near Dallas, Texas on November 25, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as round and perhaps egg-shaped, estimated to be the size of a large aircraft,It emitted a reddish halo and shafts of light that appeared to emanate from it,The object remained stationary and was visible for approximately one hour,The observer, located in the southern part of Dallas, was sincere but inexperienced in providing details about the sighting,Weather conditions were reported as clear with visibility of 10 miles and no significant clouds.
sighted object: round object with a reddish halo
witness description: civilian, very sincere but inexperienced in providing details
